articles.title: Huge Update On KL Rahul's Fitness Ahead Of Asia Cup 2023 Clash Against Pakistan - NDTV Sports
articles.description: There is some good news regarding KL Rahul's fitness ahead of India's Asia Cup 2023 match against Pakistan.
articles.content: There were several questions over KL Rahul's fitness following his Asia Cup 2023 selection as chief selector Ajit Agarkar told the media that he was suffering from a slight niggle. The call-up for th… [+1490 chars]
